topics.body:
two students, james and john were given a grammar test by their teacher, the question was, "is it better to use "had" ro "had had" in this example sentence?

the teacher collected the tests, and looked over their answers

James, while John had had "had", had had "had had". "had had" had had a better effect on the teacher
